answers.answer: Please help me....My brother-in-law had surgery on 10/20/08 and last night he had ST elevation.  He's in ICU with all kinds of drips infusing....Amiodorone, nitro, levophed, and insulin.  Now, they took him for a cardiac cath today 10/21/08 at 1200 PM...The doctor just called me and said that they had to take him back in the OR again....Apparently the  graft failed.  He's between 50-55 years old.  He was a smoker for 20+ odd years but he doesn't smoke now.  He has diabetes along with hypertension.  Is that normal for something like to happen one day post op.  I am going crazy....He still has the chest tube in place,he's off the vent.  When I left this afternoon, he was in SR with ST elevation.  I asked the nurse if they had checked his troponin but she told me no.  I am a Registered Nurse, a telemetry nurse, but I am still confused since I usually care for those patients pre and post  op.  My sister is going crazy and I don't know what to tell her.

question: My fatehr had CABG Of only with one graft. After 3 weeks of cabg he felt pain while fisrt time walking out side. doctors says its ok but one and half month they done ct coronory in whihch is wriiten lima to lad patent with distal attenuation. Our cardiologist says its ok. but after 2 months they do angio gram they coudont reach lima but the injected die and lima appers to them thread like the says lima to la d failed and said again bypass after 4 motnh pleas any one can help i have reports too so any one  wants i can send them too.
title: AFTER CABG LIMA TO LAD FAILED AFTER TWO MONTHS
